name: Soulsniper Sights, Locked 'n' Loaded!
desc:
It appears as though Chasca has been tinkering with the toy cannon.
You can now hold the Special Skill button to enter target acquisition mode. You can then fire at all targeted enemies at once by letting go of the button!
